title: Im Geschäft
translation: In the shop, there is a colorful corner. There is a big box with sockets and plugs. Anna wants to turn on her computer, but the plug is broken. She takes a new plug and connects it to the socket. Now everything works and Anna presses 'print'. The cartridge makes colorful ink on the paper. But the ink is almost empty and the paper stays white. Anna makes a complaint in the shop.
